DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to obtain safety information on the use of sitagliptin (JANUVIA®) from endocrinologists, diabetologists, internists, and general practitioners.
DOC.brief_title: A Post Marketing Safety Study of Sitagliptin (JANUVIA®) (MK-0431-234)
DOC.criteria: Must be taking sitagliptin (JANUVIA™) for the treatment of type 2 diabetes mellitus Treating physician must agree to provide information regarding the participants treatment
